overview: Luc, a film student, reappears one day in the life of his childhood friend, camera in hand. He moves into his house, determined to make Lôïc the main character of his film. Devoted body and soul to his project, Luc does not hesitate for a second to manipulate his friend's life. He hires a real actor, a transvestite, and creates for him the character of a woman, Céline. Her role: to seduce Loïc...
title: Real Movie
